mdRecord.dcterms:title: Commemorative tablets for the Lawn crosswalks, the Lawn railings and the colonnade walks,
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inscriptions: In 1968 the Lawn cross walks were renewed in remembrance of Robert Miller Jeffress, Richmond Virginia 1886-1967, University of Virginia 1905-1909, "footprints in the sands of time" [work]
In 1976-9177 the Lawn railings and the colonnade walks were renewed in remembrance of Allan Talbott Gwathmey 1903-1963, Professor of Chemistry [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations
memorials
plaques (flat objects)
walkways
railings (balustrades)
